title: When I try to log onto the PBE boards, I get an error.
body: Whenever I try to sign in on the PBE boards, I get an error and a white page that says "Unable to retrieve discussions" Im pretty sure im using the correct username and password. any suggestions?

replies.body:
Hey Department,

If you're trying to log in while the PBE server is down, sometimes, you won't be able to log in to the boards during that time.

if your live account gets suspended, will it affect your PBE account? I was chosen to be a PBE tester but I didn't notice until now and just made an account but now I'm also having the same problem as Department.

Cant access my PBE account it says Unable to retrieve discussions i dont know what to do any suggestions or ideas 
?

I've been selected to be a PBE tester for this next cycle, and I can't access the boards - I either get a blank, white screen, or the same message that Department has been getting: "Unable to retrieve discussions." I'm guessing it has something to do with my PBE account being new, because PBE users broadcasting on Twitch haven't had any issues posting there.
